articles.description: ESPN unveiled its comprehensive plans to cover the 2023 MLB Home Run Derby on July 10 from Seattle's T-Mobile Park.
articles.content: On Thursday, ESPN revealed its comprehensive plans to cover the 2023 MLB Home Run Derby from Seattle. T-Mobile Park will host the event for the first time since 2001. Based on the press release the W… [+1209 chars]
